name: Rosi Savalas
story: Rosi Savalas was born into a family of resistance fighters who fought for their homeland against the occupying forces. Growing up, she was exposed to the harsh realities of war and learned to fight from a young age. When she turned 18, she joined the resistance forces and quickly rose through the ranks due to her natural leadership abilities. Eventually, she became the guerilla leader of her faction, leading her troops in daring raids against enemy forces. Despite her fierce reputation, Rosi is fiercely loyal to her troops and will do whatever it takes to protect her homeland and her people.
